name: Demo News with Real Media
description: Demo configuration with real accessible media

fallback_content.title: Breaking: Major Tech Breakthrough in AI Research
fallback_content.description: Scientists announce groundbreaking advancement in artificial intelligence that could revolutionize computing. The new system demonstrates unprecedented capabilities in understanding and generating human language.

fallback_content.title: Global Climate Summit Reaches Historic Agreement
fallback_content.description: World leaders unite in unprecedented commitment to combat climate change. The agreement includes concrete targets for emissions reduction and renewable energy adoption by 2030.

fallback_content.title: Olympic Champion Breaks World Record
fallback_content.description: In a stunning display of athleticism, the defending champion shattered the previous world record by over 2 seconds, leaving spectators in awe.

fallback_content.title: Historic Art Discovery: Lost Masterpiece Found
fallback_content.description: Art historians confirm the authentication of a previously unknown masterpiece, discovered in a private collection after being missing for over 300 years.

fallback_content.title: Medical Breakthrough: New Treatment Shows Promise
fallback_content.description: Researchers announce successful trials of revolutionary treatment that could help millions of patients worldwide. Early results show 90% effectiveness rate.
